attributes.action: Clear fully or reduce peoples Debts due to Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Due to Covid 19 people have struggled paying their debts, due to lack or work or being let go. Because of this almost everyone is struggling to pay things such as Loans, Mortgages, Phone bills and much more.
attributes.background: Maybe the government can reduce or clear customers debts, whether its full clear debts ( ones that people have been paying for over a year and kept up to payments) not ones that have been taken out due to already struggling, or give people a set sum to pay off what they need without applying.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for lenders and borrowers.
